title: Living in Harmony with Nature | Sri Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.key_quote: Now, the whole human civilization has become so greedy for sense gratification that all the laws of material nature are discarded.
segments.summary: The speaker contrasts the Vedic civilization's focus on spiritual advancement with the current civilization's exploitation of nature for sense gratification, leading to negative consequences.
